description: Lists all in-progress, completed, or failed StartEngagementByAcceptingInvitationTask tasks that were initiated by the caller's account.

parameters.name: Catalog
parameters.description: Specifies the catalog related to the request. Valid values are: AWS: Retrieves the request from the production AWS environment. Sandbox: Retrieves the request from a sandbox environment used for testing or development purposes.

parameters.name: EngagementInvitationIdentifier
parameters.description: Filters tasks by the identifiers of the engagement invitations they are processing. (string) ---

parameters.name: OpportunityIdentifier
parameters.description: Filters tasks by the identifiers of the opportunities they created or are associated with. (string) ---

parameters.name: Sort
parameters.description: Specifies the sorting criteria for the returned results. This allows you to order the tasks based on specific attributes. Specifies the field by which the task list should be sorted. Determines the order in which the sorted results are presented.

nested_params.name: SortBy
nested_params.description: Specifies the field by which the task list should be sorted.

nested_params.name: SortOrder
nested_params.description: Determines the order in which the sorted results are presented.

parameters.name: TaskIdentifier
parameters.description: Filters tasks by their unique identifiers. Use this when you want to retrieve information about specific tasks. (string) ---

parameters.name: TaskStatus
parameters.description: Filters the tasks based on their current status. This allows you to focus on tasks in specific states. (string) ---

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: A token used for pagination to retrieve the next page of results.If there are more results available, this field will contain a token that can be used in a subsequent API call to retrieve the next page. If there are no more results, this field will be null or an empty string.

nested_items.name: TaskSummaries
nested_items.description: An array of EngagementByAcceptingInvitationTaskSummary objects, each representing a task that matches the specified filters. The array may be empty if no tasks match the criteria.

nested_items.name: EngagementInvitationId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the engagement invitation that was accepted.

nested_items.name: Message
nested_items.description: Detailed message describing the failure and possible recovery steps.

nested_items.name: OpportunityId
nested_items.description: Unique identifier of opportunity that was created.

nested_items.name: ReasonCode
nested_items.description: A code pointing to the specific reason for the failure.

nested_items.name: ResourceSnapshotJobId
nested_items.description: Unique identifier of the resource snapshot job that was created.

nested_items.name: TaskArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that uniquely identifies the task.
